ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Property_Status__c), OR( AND(TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Property_Status__c)) = "Sold", TEXT(Property_Status__c) = "Available"), AND(TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Property_Status__c)) = "Withdrawn", TEXT(Property_Status__c) = "Under Contract") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid status change. Sold properties cannot be made available, and withdrawn properties cannot go directly under contract.
